name: Wireless Bluetooth Earbuds
description: True wireless earbuds with active noise cancellation and 24-hour battery life. Perfect for music and calls on the go.

name: Gaming Mechanical Keyboard
description: RGB mechanical gaming keyboard with customizable keys and rapid response switches for competitive gaming.

name: Smart Fitness Tracker
description: Advanced fitness tracker with heart rate monitoring, sleep analysis, and 7-day battery life.

name: Wireless Charging Stand
description: Fast wireless charging stand compatible with smartphones and earbuds. Sleek design with LED indicators.

name: Noise Cancelling Headphones
description: Premium over-ear headphones with advanced noise cancellation and 30-hour battery life.

name: Laptop Backpack Professional
description: Durable laptop backpack with anti-theft design, USB charging port, and water-resistant material.

name: Smart Home Speaker
description: Voice-controlled smart speaker with premium sound quality and smart home integration capabilities.

name: Ergonomic Office Chair
description: High-back ergonomic office chair with lumbar support, adjustable arms, and breathable mesh material.

name: 4K Ultra HD Monitor
description: 27-inch 4K UHD monitor with HDR support, thin bezels, and adjustable stand for professional work.

name: Portable Power Bank
description: 20000mAh portable power bank with fast charging technology and multiple USB ports for all devices.

name: Wireless Gaming Mouse
description: High-precision wireless gaming mouse with customizable DPI, RGB lighting, and long battery life.

name: Smartphone Gimbal Stabilizer
description: 3-axis smartphone gimbal for smooth video recording and professional-grade stabilization.

name: Bluetooth Portable Speaker
description: Waterproof Bluetooth speaker with 360-degree sound and 12-hour playtime for outdoor adventures.

name: USB-C Docking Station
description: Multi-port USB-C docking station with 4K HDMI, Ethernet, USB 3.0, and power delivery for laptops.

name: Wireless Earbuds Sports
description: Sweat-proof wireless earbuds with secure fit and 8-hour battery life, perfect for workouts and running.

name: Laptop Cooling Pad
description: Adjustable laptop cooling pad with quiet fans and ergonomic design to prevent overheating.

name: Smart Desk Lamp
description: Wi-Fi enabled smart desk lamp with color temperature adjustment and voice control compatibility.

name: External SSD 1TB
description: High-speed 1TB external SSD with USB-C connectivity for fast data transfer and backup.

name: Wireless Presenter Remote
description: Professional wireless presenter with laser pointer and smooth slide control for presentations.

name: Tablet Keyboard Case
description: Protective keyboard case with backlit keys and multiple viewing angles for tablets.
